analysis.cap: Aerial view of a coastal area with a mix of land and water features.
analysis.caption: This satellite image shows a coastal area with a mix of land and water features. The image appears to be taken during the daytime, with the sun casting a shadow on the water. The land features include what appears to be a city or town, with buildings and roads visible. There are also areas of vegetation, possibly forests or parks. The water features include a large body of water, possibly an ocean or sea, and several smaller bodies of water, possibly lakes or rivers. The image also shows a network of roads and highways, as well as what appears to be a port or harbor.
